message.agritechevolved.invalid_plant_so: Seed/Sapling can't grow on this soil
message.agritechevolved.same_farmland: This farmland is already of this type!
tooltip.agritechevolved.sm_mk1_shiftdown: §aBoosts Advanced Planter and Machine processing speed by 10%§r, §cbut increases power consumption by 10%.§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.sm_mk2_shiftdown: §aBoosts Advanced Planter and Machine processing speed by 25%§r, §cbut increases power consumption by 25%.§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.sm_mk3_shiftdown: §aBoosts Advanced Planter and Machine processing speed by 50%§r, §cbut increases power consumption by 50%.§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.ym_mk1_shiftdown: §aBoosts Advanced Planter and Machine processing speed by 10%§r, §cbut decreases processing speed by 10%.§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.ym_mk2_shiftdown: §aBoosts Advanced Planter and Machine processing speed by 25%§r, §cbut decreases processing speed by 15%.§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.ym_mk3_shiftdown: §aBoosts Advanced Planter and Machine processing speed by 50%§r, §cbut decreases processing speed by 25%.§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.biomass: §aUsed as fertilizer for the Advanced Planter or to create Compacted Biomass. Use in a Biomass Burner to generate 300RF/t§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.compacted: §aUsed to create Mulch. Use in a Biomass Burner to generate 500RF/t§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.mulch: §aUsed in Planters. Grants 50% growth speed. Used to create Infused Farmland§r
tooltip.agritechevolved.infused_farmland: §aUsed in Planters or as normal farmland. Grants 100% growth speed.§r
